file_content.text: Disturbing intel coming in from our Republic sources, Commander. A group of rogue security agents on Coruscant is stirring up trouble with a false flag operation.
They're led by Commander Kallin, an outspoken critic of the Alliance. They're going to attack the Senate Tower and plant evidence that makes it look like we're to blame.
We tracked Kallin and his followers to their hideout in Coruscant's industrial underbelly. Do the galaxy a favor and stop these scum!
I don't always approve of your methods, Commander. You can be bloodthirsty and ruthless sometimes. But you and I are on the same page here. Kallin deserved what he got.
Appreciate you taking out Kallin and those rogue security agents, Commander. I consider it a personal favor. This one hit close to home.
Traitors willing to sacrifice innocent civilians and blame it on someone else to start a war are the lowest of the low. Makes me sick.
I used to think the Republic was better than the Sith, but those days are long gone. Guess that's why I'm with the Alliance now.
Disturbing intel coming in from the Republic. Commander Kallin, a former ally of Chancellor Saresh, wants payback for her execution.
He's leading a rogue security team in a false flag terrorist operation. They're going to attack the Senate Tower and plant evidence implicating the Alliance.
Disturbing intel coming in from the Republic. Commander Kallin, a former ally of Chancellor Saresh, wants payback for her execution.
He's leading a rogue security team in a false flag terrorist operation. They're going to attack the Senate Tower and plant evidence implicating the Alliance.
